name: Re:Exec
description:
Re:Exec is a 3D platforming game where you help your future self to progress in different puzzles through separate instances of yourself.

It features

  • 5 levels
  • Clean, Portal inspired visuals 
  • Unique gameplay
  • Builds for Windows, Linux and macOS
  • Downloadable OST

The game was made for the Brackeys "Stronger Together" Game Jam 2021.1.

Note: It is strongly recommended downloading a build for your platform instead of playing the WebGL version!

Developed by mariian and RadioArtz on the Brackeys Community Discord
